metadata.title: CVE-2020-10592 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Tor before 0.3.5.10, 0.4.x before 0.4.1.9, and 0.4.2.x before 0.4.2.7allows remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service (CPU consumption), akaTROVE-2020-002.

criterions.comment: tor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
